author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
Developed from an earlier short story, The October Film Haunt by Michael Wehunt blends occult and modern slasher themes to disturb and delight. Jorie Stroud has removed all things horror from her life following a tragedy she accidentally set in motion a decade ago; now she lives with her son in sleepy, backwater Vermont, scare-free […]

The post REVIEW: The October Film Haunt by Michael Wehunt appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The October Film Haunt by Michael Wehunt
